# Preface {.unnumbered}

Quarto is a modern publishing system for authoring books and websites.

This book is a guide for new authors to learn how to write books using the Quarto publishing system.

While the [Quarto Guide][1] is comprehensive documentation on how to use Quarto, it could be a bit overwhelming for those who have not used systems like these. This book is carefully planned to be accessible for the beginners.

[1]: https://quarto.org/docs/guide/
